name: Quest - escape from the room
description:
Welcome to the adventure quest where you need to get out of the room, solving all the puzzles, collecting all the items, studying all the information.

You will find yourself in a certain room, you do not remember anything from the past, you know for sure that the room is not yours, and even if there is something in common, this is just to mislead you. Are you alone or not? Is it just a room with riddles or something more? Information will abound. Your task is to leave the room.

Advantages of the game:
+ this is a quest: click, go through the scenes , collect items, use them
+ 2 languages: English and Russian

+ 4 locations and many additional locations
+ different puzzles
+ some plot (may expand with updates)
+ easy interface

Gameplay tips:
1) There are no saves in the game, remember what you did
2) There is no "Enter" button in the game when entering passwords, the code will be applied automatically if it is correct

——
To play with sounds - unlock sound on iPhone
